job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate and evaluate code, rather than building, training, or deploying AI models. It emphasizes human feedback and interaction with AI, aligning more with AI-assisted tasks than core AI engineering roles.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'help train AI models' directly relates to the process of developing or improving machine learning models, which falls under the Modeling category.
This phrase explicitly mentions training generative AI models, which is a core aspect of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
job_tasks.justification: This describes a process of generating data (questions and answers) that will be used to train AI models, fitting within the broader scope of Modeling activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking model outputs is a crucial part of the model development and fine-tuning process, which is encompassed by the Modeling task.

technologies.justification: The job description explicitly mentions working with 'large language models', which are a type of generative model.
This phrase directly refers to generative AI models, a key technology in this domain.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: This suggests that the role is open to individuals who can learn and adapt to AI concepts and tools, indicating a need for learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: lend your coding expertise to train AI models
soft_skills.justification: Lending expertise implies taking initiative and ownership of a task, aligning with innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science
soft_skills.justification: Crafting questions requires analytical thinking and problem-solving to generate relevant training data.

soft_skills.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
soft_skills.justification: Evaluating and ranking requires critical assessment and judgment, which are aspects of problem-solving and pragmatism.
